Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete SiliconFlow provider configuration to support ClaudeCode and Codex

- Add ClaudeCode and Codex support with API endpoints and model configurations
- Update provider category from ''thirdParty'' to ''aggregator'' to reflect its nature as a model aggregation platform
- Add categories [''claudeCode'', ''codex''] to make SiliconFlow visible in key creation templates
- Add apiKeyUrl pointing to cloud.siliconflow.cn/account/ak
- Add Codex authentication rule with OpenAI-compatible auth support
- Update configuration version from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1
- Update lastUpdated timestamp to 2025-12-02

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
